title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Higher Social Education Course Design Using Visual Language

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social concepts and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can structure social phenomena using visual modeling tools.
Learners can visually represent over 80% of educational design documents using E2ML (Education to Modeling Language)-based diagrams.
Learners can collaboratively design educational scenarios to solve complex social problems with team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
